<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Vector, Reduction, and Cube instructions need to fill the entire instruction group to work correctly.

This pass expands these individual instructions into several instructions that will completely fill the instruction group.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Expand the instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Reduction instructions:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;X = DP4 T1&#95;XYZW, T2&#95;XYZW</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// becomes:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TO&#95;X = DP4 T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TO&#95;Y (write masked) = DP4 T1&#95;Y, T2&#95;Y</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TO&#95;Z (write masked) = DP4 T1&#95;Z, T2&#95;Z</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TO&#95;W (write masked) = DP4 T1&#95;W, T2&#95;W</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Vector instructions:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;X = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// becomes:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;X = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;Y (write masked) = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;Z (write masked) = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;W (write masked) = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cube instructions:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;XYZW = CUBE T1&#95;XYZW</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// becomes:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TO&#95;X = CUBE T1&#95;Z, T1&#95;Y</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;Y = CUBE T1&#95;Z, T1&#95;X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;Z = CUBE T1&#95;X, T1&#95;Z</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// T0&#95;W = CUBE T1&#95;Y, T1&#95;Z</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Chan = 0; Chan &lt; 4; Chan++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> DstReg =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Src1 = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
